settings.title: How do I place an order?
settings.description:
Add items to your basket as you shop in your preferred size and colorway. You can view and amend the contents of your basket at any time by clicking the Cart button in the top right of each page. Once you are happy with your items proceed to Checkout and follow the on screen instructions which will take you to our secure payment page.

Discount Codes
To apply a discount code during offers and promotions when checking out on a mobile device, proceed to Checkout and click 'Have a discount code?' near the top of your screen. A drop down will appear for you to type in your code and click 'Apply'. Please note that only one discount code can be applied to an order at any time.

settings.title: What are the shipping costs?
settings.description:
We offer FREE shipping over $49.00 total order in 47 countries.

The shipping fee (without reaching free shipping) is $7.50. Once your order has been processed, it will be shipped via our partnering courier companies, USPS and local postal services. You will receive a shipping confirmation email with your shipping details and a tracking number which you can use to track your order online. Items may require collection from your local post office according to your local postage system. Please be sure to take your ID and delivery notification upon collection. When ordering more than one item these may be sent out in separate packages at no additional shipping cost. Each shipment is given a unique tracking numbers and you will be notified via our automated tracking system.

settings.title: What are the shipping times?
settings.description:
Shipping time:
Processing time + Delivery time

Processing time:
Items will ship within 2-7 days.

Delivery time:
3-5 weeks

We do our best to ship as soon as possible and often you will receive your order much sooner. However please note that we cannot guarantee delivery times and in the rare case of unforeseen issues with courier or logistics delivery may take longer. If your order has not arrived within 90 days from dispatch you will be eligible for a full refund.

settings.title: Shipping countries
settings.description: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Colombia, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Russian Federation, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Sint Maarten, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States

settings.title: What payment types are accepted here?
settings.description: We accept debit or credit card payments, including Visa, Mastercard and American Express through our trusted and encrypted payment processor - Stripe® Payments. You can also pay via PayPal, Apple Pay or Google Pay. Your payment information is secured and confidental.

settings.title: I have only received one item from my order, where is the rest?
settings.description: When ordering more than one item these may be fulfilled from different warehouses and sent out in separate packages to accelerate shipping times. Each shipment is given a unique tracking numbers and you will be notified via our automated tracking system. If you receive part of your order first don't worry as the rest will be on it's way.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.description: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with your shipping details and a tracking number which you can use to track your order from the email through the tracking link, or you can use our Track order page. It can take a day or so for the tracking status to sync and show upon our tracking system. So if it shows as pending don’t worry, your items are on their way and we advise you to check back in a day or so.

settings.title: Custom and duties
settings.description: Deliveries may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are set by your country's local customs office. All applicable duties, fees and any additional charges are outside of our control and you will be responsible for these payments. Refunds will not be given on packages that are refused or delayed due to unpaid taxes or duties.

settings.title: Order cancellation
settings.description: If you wish to cancel your order please contact us within 24 hours of order placement. After this you may be able to cancel up until the point of packing and dispatch (once accepted by us). All sales are final after dispatch. If you do cancel the contract before then you will incur a 10% cancellation fee to cover restocking fees and the charges assessed to us for refunds by credit card providers. Payments made by you will be refunded within 30 days.

settings.title: Refund Policy & Returns
settings.description:
Returns
Our policy lasts 14 days. Your item must be unused and returned in its original packaging in the same condition that you received it. You are required to notify us if your wish to return your item by contacting us at info@babypanda.shop and we will provide you with instructions. Once this period has expired, we are unable to offer a refund or exchange.

Along with your returned item please also include the original order number, your name, delivery address and the reason for returning. Returns must be sent to our Headquarters in the US, or our Offices in the UK. The cost of returning the item is the responsibility of the customer and is non-refundable. We recommend the use of a trackable service for returns as we are unable to refund items that fail to reach us.

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within 30 days.

Refunds
Refunds will be given for the following:
  • The item is significantly different from that described
  • The item is damaged or has defects
  • The item has not arrived within the promised delivery period of 90 days

We reserve the right to refuse the return or refund of items when they do not meet the conditions outlined above. In the case of a faulty, incorrect or defective item please contact us within 14 days at info@babypanda.shop with full details of the fault and include pictures where possible. This does not include general wear and tear.

If the items are not damaged or defective but you wish to receive a refund you may return it as outlined above in the 'Returns' section. In some cases, you may be able to keep the item and agree on a partial refund.

We strive for 100% customer satisfaction, therefore if your item doesn't arrive within our promised delivery period of 90 days you will be eligible for a full refund.

Refunds will not be given on packages that are refused or delayed due to unpaid customs taxes or duties, packages for which the customer has provided an incorrect address, packages which have not been collected in time from the post office or that have been lost in the post. Please double check your address details carefully before submitting your order.

Exchanges (if applicable)
You are eligible for an exchange if the item is defective, damaged or incorrect. If you would like to exchange your purchase for the same item, please send us an email at info@babypanda.shop within 14 days of receiving your purchase. Depending on where you live, the time it will take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

Return Shipping
We will provide you with return shipping information, please do not send your purchase straight back to the manufacturer. You will be responsible for paying for the shipping costs for the return of your item, unless it is faulty or defective. Shipping costs are unfortunately non-refundable.

Please contact info@babypanda.shop with any queries you may have regarding a refund or return.

settings.imgblock_desc:
Welcome to Baby Banda Shop, a lovingly curated collection of beautiful products for you and your little one, inspired by nature, modern prints and all things cute, colourful and fun! Our mission is to bring you adorable, on-trend babywear and accessories at the most affordable prices. In order to fulfil this mission we hand select beautiful products from suppliers and artisans in Europe, Asia and United States who will ship your items to you directly bringing you the best deals on the latest trends. We are dedicated to delivering fantastic product and service, and are frequently adding new and exciting items to our store so be sure to check out our new arrivals!

With so many gorgeous things to choose from, we hope you enjoy browsing our range of clothing, accessories, nursery decor, toys, baby carriage and much more!
settings.section_2_introtxt: Baby Panda gives you an easy simple ordering process to not worry about your goods and delivery. Once you placed your order, we'll make sure you get the desired products as soon as possible and intact. In case that you are not satisfied with delivered product, we give your 14 days money back guarantee and refund.
settings.section_2_icon_detailone: Put the products in to the cart you want to buy for your baby and go to the checkout process. Don't forget we offer FREE SHIPPING over 49$.
settings.section_2_icon_detailtwo: Choose one of the popular payment options, such as credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay or PayPal. Your credit card details always secured and confidental.
settings.section_2_icon_detailthree: Once your order has been processed and shipped you will get a tracking code and you can follow the route of your products until it's delivered.
settings.imgsection_1_desc: All of the products in our store is quality selected and approved. As a mother you always want to give the best for your babies and kids, as we want the same to our customers. We spend a lot of time choosing the best baby products for you and your beloved baby, thus saving a lot of time for moms to get those many things done what a baby requires.
settings.author_1_name: Always the best quality baby products
settings.imgsection_2_desc: There’s nothing quite like finding out you're expecting your first child when you're actively trying to conceive. Although the news is obviously welcomed, it can be normal to feel a mix of excitement, anxiety, and even a tinge of fear. Especially once you make it past the initial shock and start thinking about all the looming to-do list leading up to baby’s arrival. There's just so much to do — and so much to buy. You can find here everything you need in one place.
settings.author_2_name: Motherhood is a great honor and privilege
settings.test_1_desc: " Lucky to be an entrepreneur working with great giant named Chutti. Store both in person and online and I honestly can't recommend them enough. You will love the quality on the whole"
settings.test_2_desc: "I love to be part of Chutti team. The quality of their fabrics is impeccable. All Kids products are high-quality, and they always have amazing, unique pieces that help my garments to stand out"
settings.test_3_desc: "Completely love our team and honor their hard work toward giving life to customers dream. The fit is great and so are the prices. Hope you will have great style and shopping experience. "

settings.text_1: Shopping for your kids’ clothe? The best places for good quality and  affordable    children's clothes.

settings.text_desc: All around good product. Non slip, well made, and just the right size for any curious and independent two year old (90 cm and up I reckon) trying to reach average adult height surfaces. Great service; helpful and friendly advice.

It's a beautiful t-shirt and was quickly sent and well packaged.

We were very happy to give it as a gift as it's such lovely cotton and the print looks great on it too. Thanks so much for your wonderful customer service and quick shipping.

I just wanted you to know that we absolutely loved the dress.  When we received the dress, I was shocked at how beautiful it was.  It had such amazing beading and lace and the design was so amazing.  On the day my daughter wore it she looked like an angel.

settings.heading_text: Always the best quality baby products
settings.paragraph_text: All products in our store are quality controlled and approved. As a mother you always want to give the best for your babies and kids, as we want the same to our customers. We spend a lot of time to fill our collection with the best baby products for you and your beloved baby, thus saving a lot of time for moms to get those many things done what a baby requires.
